## Safety Classification

Please classify this feature request:

- [ ] **Infrastructure/Tooling** - No changes to tuning algorithms (e.g., CI, docs, logging)
- [ ] **Bug Fix/Robustness** - Fixes incorrect behavior without changing math
- [ ] **Tuning Algorithm Change** - Modifies VE correction, AFR error, or kernels (requires Math Guardian review)
